languages.text: "Где человеком движет стремление к Знанию, угодное Омниссии, ксеносом движет болезненное любопытство к изобретению новых зловредств".
"Where the human is driven by a desire for Knowledge that pleases the Omnissiah, the xenos is driven by a morbid curiosity to invent new evils."
languages.original_text: "Где человеком движет стремление к Знанию, угодное Омниссии, ксеносом движет болезненное любопытство к изобретению новых зловредств".

traits.locale_text: "Where the human is driven by a desire for Knowledge that pleases the Omnissiah, the xenos is driven by a morbid curiosity to invent new evils."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Where the human is driven by a desire for Knowledge that pleases the Omnissiah, the xenos is driven by a morbid curiosity to invent new evils."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Where the human is driven by a desire for Knowledge that pleases the Omnissiah, the xenos is driven by a morbid curiosity to invent new evils."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Where the human is driven by a desire for Knowledge that pleases the Omnissiah, the xenos is driven by a morbid curiosity to invent new evils."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “人类被求知欲所驱使，以取悦欧姆尼塞亚。异形则被病态的好奇心所驱使，从而创造新的邪恶。”
languages.original_text: "Where the human is driven by a desire for Knowledge that pleases the Omnissiah, the xenos is driven by a morbid curiosity to invent new evils."

traits.locale_text: “人类被求知欲所驱使，以取悦欧姆尼塞亚。异形则被病态的好奇心所驱使，从而创造新的邪恶。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Alors que les humains cherchent la Connaissance pour la plus grande gloire de l'Omnimessie, les xénos, animés par une curiosité des plus morbides, inventent sans arrêt de nouveaux moyens de faire le mal. »
languages.original_text: "Where the human is driven by a desire for Knowledge that pleases the Omnissiah, the xenos is driven by a morbid curiosity to invent new evils."

traits.locale_text: « Alors que les humains cherchent la Connaissance pour la plus grande gloire de l'Omnimessie, les xénos, animés par une curiosité des plus morbides, inventent sans arrêt de nouveaux moyens de faire le mal. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Mientras que al ser humano le guía una sed de conocimiento que satisface al Omnissiah, a los xenos los impulsa una curiosidad mórbida para inventar nuevas maldades».
languages.original_text: "Where the human is driven by a desire for Knowledge that pleases the Omnissiah, the xenos is driven by a morbid curiosity to invent new evils."

traits.locale_text: «Mientras que al ser humano le guía una sed de conocimiento que satisface al Omnissiah, a los xenos los impulsa una curiosidad mórbida para inventar nuevas maldades».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「人間は万機神を喜ばせる知識を渇望して動く。異種族が新たな邪悪を生み出すのに病的なまでの好奇心を発揮するのと同じようなものだ」
languages.original_text: "Where the human is driven by a desire for Knowledge that pleases the Omnissiah, the xenos is driven by a morbid curiosity to invent new evils."

traits.locale_text: 「人間は万機神を喜ばせる知識を渇望して動く。異種族が新たな邪悪を生み出すのに病的なまでの好奇心を発揮するのと同じようなものだ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Wo der Mensch von einem Streben nach Wissen angetrieben wird, das den Omnissiah erfreut, wird der Xenos von einer morbiden Neugier angetrieben, neues Böses zu ersinnen."
languages.original_text: "Where the human is driven by a desire for Knowledge that pleases the Omnissiah, the xenos is driven by a morbid curiosity to invent new evils."

traits.locale_text: "Wo der Mensch von einem Streben nach Wissen angetrieben wird, das den Omnissiah erfreut, wird der Xenos von einer morbiden Neugier angetrieben, neues Böses zu ersinnen."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "Where the human is driven by a desire for Knowledge that pleases the Omnissiah, the xenos is driven by a morbid curiosity to invent new evils."

languages.text: "İnsan, Hermesih'i memnun edecek İrfan arayışında; zenolar ise yeni kötülükler bulmaya yönelik hastalıklı bir merakla hareket ediyor."
languages.original_text: "Where the human is driven by a desire for Knowledge that pleases the Omnissiah, the xenos is driven by a morbid curiosity to invent new evils."

traits.locale_text: "İnsan, Hermesih'i memnun edecek İrfan arayışında; zenolar ise yeni kötülükler bulmaya yönelik hastalıklı bir merakla hareket ediyor."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
